General.Name: Odfjell Drilling Ltd.
General.Description: Odfjell Drilling Ltd. owns and operates mobile offshore drilling units primarily in Norway and Namibia. The company operates in two segments, Own Fleet and External Fleet. It offers management services to other owners of drilling units, such as operational management, regulatory requirements management, marketing, contract negotiations and client relations, and operation and mobilization preparation services. The company was founded in 1914 and is headquartered in Aberdeen, the United Kingdom. Odfjell Drilling Ltd. is a subsidiary of Odfjell Partners Holding Ltd.
General.Address: Bergen House, Aberdeen, United Kingdom, AB12 3LG
